required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion and Absolute Bioavailability of AG-348 in Healthy Male Participants Following Administration of a Single Oral Dose of [14C]AG-348 and Concomitant Single Intravenous Microdose of [13C6]AG-348
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-label Study to Evaluate the Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, and Excretion and to Assess the Absolute Bioavailability of AG-348 in Healthy Male Subjects Following Administration of a Single Oral Dose of [14C]AG-348 and Concomitant Single Intravenous Microdose of [13C6]AG-348

brief_summary.textblock: This study will assess absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion and absolute bioavailability of AG-348 in healthy male participants. Potential participants will be screened within 29 days prior to dose administration to determine eligibility. Eligible Participants will be admitted into the Clinical Research Unit (CRU) one day prior to administration of AG-348 and will be confined to the CRU until at least Day 8. If participants are not eligible for discharge on Day 8, they may remain in the CRU up to Day 11. Radiolabelled analytes of AG-348 will be administered in a single oral and intravenous (IV) dose on Day 1. Participants will be required to fast pre-dose, remain in a supine position for 1 hour post-dose and avoid water for 2 hours post-dose.

primary_outcome.measure: AG-348 Excreted Through Urine [A(eu)]
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-4 hours (hr), 4-8 hr, 8-12 hr, 12-24 hr, 24-36 hr, 36-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: AG-348 Excreted through Feces [A(ef)]
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-24 hr, 24-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Total Amount Excreted Through Urine [Cumulative A(eu)] of AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-4 hours (hr), 4-8 hr, 8-12 hr, 12-24 hr, 24-36 hr, 36-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Total Amount Excreted Through Feces [Cumulative A(ef)] of AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-24 hr, 24-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage Excreted in Urine [f(eu)] of AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-4 hours (hr), 4-8 hr, 8-12 hr, 12-24 hr, 24-36 hr, 36-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage Excreted in Feces [f(ef)] of AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-24 hr, 24-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Renal Clearance [CL(R)] for AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-4 hours (hr), 4-8 hr, 8-12 hr, 12-24 hr, 24-36 hr, 36-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Total Radioactivity in Total Excreta (Urine and Feces)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-4 hours (hr), 4-8 hr, 8-12 hr, 12-24 hr, 24-36 hr, 36-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to the Last Non-Zero Concentration [AUC(0- t)]
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity Concentration [AUC(0-inf)]
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Concentration (Cmax)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Time of Observed Cmax (Tmax)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Terminal Elimination Half-life [t(1/2)]
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Ratio of [AUC(0-inf)] of Plasma AG-348 Relative to [AUC(0-inf)] of Plasma Total Radioactivity, [AUC(0-inf)] Plasma AG-348/Total Radioactivity Ratio
Ratio of [AUC(0-inf)] of Whole Blood Total Radioactivity Relative to [AUC(0-inf)] of Plasma Total Radioactivity, [AUC(0-inf)] Blood/Plasma Ratio
Total Clearance (CL) of [13C6]AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution [V(z)] of [13C6]AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution at Steady State [V(ss)] for [13C6]AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Absolute Bioavailability (F) for AG-348
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min, 61 min, 62 min, 75 min, 90, min 105 min, 2 hr, 3hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, 8 hr, 10 hr, 12, hr 16, hr 24 hr, 36 hr, 48 hr and 72 hr post-oral dose

primary_outcome.measure: Plasma Concentrations of AG-348 Metabolites
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and 30 min, 61 min, 2 hr, 4 hr, 8 hr, 12 hr, 24, hr, 48 hr, 72 hr, 120 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration of AG-348 Metabolites in Urine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-4 hours (hr), 4-8 hr, 8-12 hr, 12-24 hr, 24-36 hr, 36-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration of AG-348 Metabolites in Feces
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-oral dose and 0-24 hr, 24-48 hr, 48-72 hr, 72-96 hr, 96-120 hr, 120-144 hr and 168 hr post-oral dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Experiencing an Adverse Event
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening to the end of study (up to 40 days)

arm_group.description: On Day 1, participants fasting for at least 10 hours the night before will receive oral AG-348 followed by intravenous (IV) [13C6]AG-348, 1 hour post-oral dose.

intervention.description: 120 milligrams (mg) oral capsule, single dose, contains 100 microcuries (μCi) of radio labelled [14C]AG-348.
IV microdose of approximately 100 micrograms (mcg), single dose.
